item.title: Rocking manhole cover, 23rd December
item.description:
The manhole cover pictured outside The Fishbar, 166 Jamaica Road. Is very noisy when a vehicle drives over it. The noise can be constant day and night as the road is very busy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 164, Jamaica Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering outside No 2 Belfast Road, 23rd December
item.description:
Yet again black bin bag left outside No 2 Belfast Road N16 6UH has split open and spilt food and other waste onto kerb and pavement. Camera not working so no photo
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Belfast Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Rubbish dump in Bournemouth Close street opposite Peckham Palms., 23rd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 183, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London

item.title: In front of Building Site on Granville Road NW6 and in front of Red Brick Building Being Reconstructed, 23rd December
item.description:
